attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition and show your support to keeping The Durham Free School open.

It is clear to the parents and students of this school the positive impact it has made on their lives and would be devastating to be closed due to controversial political opinion.

Keep this school open for the right reasons. Don't close the for the wrong reasons. Whilst there are just over 90 pupils, if every parent signs this petition, it would represent 100% support. Prove the politicians wrong. Sign the petition.
